Yes, Zeph's ability to manipulate illusion magic is a powerful skill that allows him to influence the perception of space and time. This type of magic is often used for deception, concealment, and distraction, and can be used in a variety of ways to support his allies and outsmart his enemies.

For example, he can create illusory duplicates of himself or others to confuse and distract the enemy, create illusory barriers to protect himself and others, or even create illusory landscapes to disorient and trap his opponents. He can also use this ability to create false scenarios to mislead others, he could make enemies believe that the battle is going in a different direction, or make allies believe that they are in a different location.

Additionally, Zeph's ability to manipulate time perception could also be useful in battle, as he could make his enemies perceive time as moving slower or faster than it actually is, giving him an advantage over them. He could also use this ability to create time loops, which could make enemies relive the same moments over and over again.

Overall, Zeph's illusion magic is a powerful tool that gives him a unique advantage in battle and can be used in a variety of ways to support his allies and outsmart his enemies.
